pageProduct.name: Allens Fantales 120g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Allen's Fantales are individually wrapped pieces of chewy caramel fudge cubes coated in delicious rich chocolate. Share the fun, pick a wrapper and test your family and friends with the celebrity trivia. Lick it, suck it or chew it, which famous celebrity will you guess next? Will it be Hugh Jackman, Nicole Kidman, or The Simpsons? 

Warnings

Milk, Soy, Soybean, Wheat,Peanut, Tree Nuts

Common Uses

Perfect for parties, sharing and general entertaining. Open a little bit of fun with Allen's.

Ingredients

Sugar, Glucose Syrup (Wheat or Corn), Sweetened Condensed Milk (Milk, Sugar) Vegetable Fat [Emulsifiers, (Sorbitan Tristearate, Soy Lecithin)], Milk Solids, Cocoa, Invert Sugar, Salt, Emulsifier (Soy Lecithin), Flavour.
